channel.title: Nirvanas Flawless Lotto Number Generator
channel.description:
Well my Grand Father was pulling Numbers of of a hat to Get Lotto Numbers. So I made this.
TOS: If you Win over 10m of Any Currency you have to Give me 1m! Kidding lol!
How to use: DL the Java file, Compile it. Then make a batch file to run it. Put this in that batch file. [code]@echo off :1 cls java LottoRadomiser pause goto 1 cls[/code]
Fetures: Generates a Number from 0-45. If the Number is 0 it will Regenerate. If 2 of the Random Numbers are equal one will Regenerate.
Its Perfect :)
DL Attachment.

item.title: Nirvanas Flawless Lotto Number Generator
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

pmg hw can i compele thios? i get java error

i coepy this up and it no work!!! I WANT 10m rs2gp from your lotto!
how do i add this to moparscape?? HLP PLS!! i giv u servr sourse!!!1

[code]public class LottoRandomiser {

public static int random(int range) { 
	return (int)(java.lang.Math.random() * (range+1));
} 
public static void main(String[] args) { 	
    int Random1 = 0; 
    int Random2 = 0; 
    int Random3 = 0; 
    int Random4 = 0; 
    int Random5 = 0; 
    int Random6 = 0; 
    Random1 = random(46); 
    Random2 = random(46); 
    Random3 = random(46); 
    Random4 = random(46); 
    Random5 = random(46); 
    Random6 = random(46); 
	if(Random1 == 0) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} else if(Random2 == 0) { 
	Random2 = random(46);
	} else if(Random3 == 0) { 
	Random3 = random(46);
	} else if(Random4 == 0) { 
	Random4 = random(46);
	} else if(Random5 == 0) { 
	Random5 = random(46);
	} else if(Random6 == 0) { 
	Random6 = random(46);
	} 

	if(Random1 == Random2) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random1 == Random3) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random1 == Random4) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random1 == Random5) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random1 == Random6) { 
	Random1 = random(46);
	} 
	
	if(Random2 == Random3) { 
	Random2 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random2 == Random4) { 
	Random2 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random2 == Random5) { 
	Random2 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random2 == Random6) { 
	Random2 = random(46);
	} 
	
	if(Random3 == Random4) { 
	Random3 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random3 == Random5) { 
	Random3 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random3 == Random6) { 
	Random3 = random(46);
	} 
	
	if(Random4 == Random5) { 
	Random4 = random(46);
	} 
	else if(Random4 == Random6) { 
	Random4 = random(46);
	} 
	
	if(Random5 == Random6) { 
	Random5 = random(46);
	} 		
    System.out.println(""+Random1+""); 
	System.out.println(""+Random2+""); 
	System.out.println(""+Random3+""); 
	System.out.println(""+Random4+""); 
	System.out.println(""+Random5+""); 
	System.out.println(""+Random6+""); 
}

} [/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 01:54:11 PM[/size][hr]L2ARRAY

Well my Grand Father was pulling Numbers of of a hat to Get Lotto Numbers. So I made this.

TOS:
If you Win over 10m of Any Currency you have to Give me 1m! Kidding lol!

How to use:
DL the Java file, Compile it.
Then make a batch file to run it.
Put this in that batch file.

@echo off :1 cls java LottoRadomiser pause goto 1 cls

Generates a Number from 0-45.
If the Number is 0 it will Regenerate.
If 2 of the Random Numbers are equal one will Regenerate.
